completed_steps.summary: Classified as monolith SPA with 1 part (web)
Found 10 existing docs in docs/ + README + deployment.md
Tech stack: React 18, Vite, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, Vercel Serverless
Deep scan complete: 3 API endpoints, 4 features, 10+ UI components documented
Source tree analysis with critical directory annotations generated
Dev & Deployment guides updated with Vercel configuration
Supporting documentation (API contracts, Data models, UI inventory) generated

findings.technology_stack: React 18, Vite 5, TypeScript 5.9, Tailwind CSS 3, Framer Motion 12, Nodemailer, Vercel
findings.verification_summary: Scanned all critical directories. Verified API endpoints (contact, audit, og), Data models (ContactPayload, ApplyFormSchema), and UI inventory.
findings.open_risks: 1. 'Newsletter' feature mentioned in user history but NOT found in codebase (api/contact.ts handles leads, not explicit newsletter subscription endpoint found). 2. api/og.tsx relies on Edge Runtime.
findings.next_checks: 1. Implement dedicated Newsletter subscription endpoint if required. 2. Add E2E tests for new features.
